description: Agent-to-Agent Secure Communication Network - Post-quantum P2P gossip for AI agents
phase_1_2_summary: Phase 1.2 Complete - Network Transport Integration with all 11 tasks: Transport dependencies, NetworkConfig, PeerCache with epsilon-greedy peer selection, PeerConnected/PeerDisconnected events, message passing with JSON/binary serialization, Agent integration with join_network/subscribe/publish, bootstrap support with exponential backoff retry, network lifecycle tests, documentation. 244/244 tests passing, zero warnings.

review.summary: Phase 3.2 execution delegated to background agent a3ac7e8. Agent will create plan, execute all tasks, and run /gsd-review --task after each task completion. Phase 3.1 complete (Grade A+, 6 VPS nodes healthy).

phase_3_1_summary: Phase 3.1 Complete - Testnet Deployment: 10 tasks including x0x-bootstrap binary (266 lines), 6 VPS configs, systemd service, 5 deployment scripts (~650 lines), comprehensive docs. All 6 global nodes healthy (NYC, SFO, Helsinki, Nuremberg, Singapore, Tokyo). Grade A+, zero warnings.
phase_1_4_summary: Phase 1.4 Complete - CRDT Task Lists with all 10 tasks implemented and 3 critical bugs fixed: Unix timestamps for global conflict resolution, add_task() merging, tasks_ordered() OR-Set filtering. 281/281 tests passing, zero warnings.
phase_2_2_summary: Phase 2.2 Complete - Python Bindings (PyO3): 10 tasks including project setup, identity/agent/network bindings, pub/sub, TaskList CRDTs, events, type stubs, integration tests, and comprehensive examples. Zero warnings, all examples validated.
phase_2_3_status: DEFERRED - Requires manual DevOps setup (GitHub secrets, external accounts). Can be completed after Phase 2.4.
phase_2_4_summary: Phase 2.4 Complete - GPG-Signed SKILL.md: 8 tasks including SKILL.md creation (1655 lines), API docs, architecture deep-dive, GPG signing infrastructure, verification scripts, A2A Agent Card, installation scripts (Unix/Windows/Python), distribution package updates. Grade A+, zero warnings.
milestone_2_summary: Milestone 2: 75% Complete - Multi-Language Distribution. Phase 2.1 (Node.js) ✅, Phase 2.2 (Python) ✅, Phase 2.3 (CI/CD) DEFERRED, Phase 2.4 (SKILL.md) ✅. Total: 2,700+ lines across bindings and SKILL.md infrastructure. Phase 2.3 requires manual GitHub secrets setup.
